content: रुचिः(ची) {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [रुच्-कि वा ङीप्] {@--1@} Light, lustre, splendour, brightness; रुचिमिंदुदले करोत्यजः परिपूर्णंदुरुचिर्महीपतिः <ls>Śi. 16. 71</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 67</ls>; <ls>Me. 15.</ls> {@--2@} A ray of light; as in रुचिभर्तृ <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--3@} Appearance, colour, beauty (usually at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); पटलं बहिर्बहलपंकरुचि <ls>Śi. 9. 19.</ls> {@--4@} Taste, relish; as in रुचिकर. {@--5@} Zest, hunger, appetite. {@--6@} Wish, desire, pleasure; स्वरुच्या ‘at will or pleasure. {@--7@} Liking, taste; विमार्गगायाश्च रुचिः स्वकांते <ls>Bv. 1. 125</ls> ‘liking or love’; न स क्षितीशो रुचये बभूव; भिन्नरुचिर्हि लोकः <ls>R. 6. 30</ls>; नाट्यं भिन्नरुचेर्जनस्य बहुधाप्येकं समाराधनं <ls>M. 1. 4</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘indulging in’, ‘devoted or addicted to’; हिंसारुचेः <ls>Māl. 5. 29.</ls> {@--8@} Passion, close application to any object {@--9@} A kind of yellow pigment ( गोरोचना).
